answers.2: Hercules was ordered by Eurystheus to kill the lion
answers.3: Hercules was ordered by Eurystheus to kill the lion who was rendering the Nemean valley unsafe
answers.4: Therefore into the woods in which the lion was living he took himself at once
answers.12: All that lived in the region rejoiced
answers.13: All that lived in the region, when they received the report about the death of the lion, rejoiced
answers.14: However all that lived in the region, when they received the report about the death of the lion, exceedingly rejoiced and held Hercules in great honor
